programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: This classic romance stars Linda Lin and Kwan Shan, capturing a touching love story between a famous nightclub singer and a young architect.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: After a kidnapped swordsman is surprisingly rescued by the father he had been looking for, he also learns about his mother from him.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: In this film, award winning actor Ku Feng stars as the 'Whip Devil' alongside Shih Szu as the 'The Lady Hermit' against the masters of mayhem.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: When villains 'Winged Tiger' Teng Fei and 'Underworld King' Yin Te Lung unite, the martial arts world is plunged into chaos. Can this deadly duo be stopped?

programme.title: King Cat

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po and Chin Han return with a Huangmei Opera classic, depicting a loving couple whose marriage is being poisoned by the husband's stepmother.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang presents this brilliant kung fu comedy, incorporating, some of the best-executed fight sequences ever caught on film.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, director Lo Wei plays a fishing village bully, whose son lusts after a local beauty.

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: To save his son from being killed, the head of the Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends his son to be hidden by a master fighter. Will the boy prove a hero?

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: After a guilty Alex confesses his affair to Tung, his injured wife, she somehow ends up living with Alex's mother and his mistress under the same roof!

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: After a compulsive gambler's wife leaves him, he gets offered a beautiful ghost as his new wife.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: Sek Kin takes a refreshing break from his usual villain's role, playing a friendly ghost who befriends a young boy and helps him reunite his separated parents.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Ti Lung plays a helpless man who is under the spell of an evil witch doctor in this bone-chilling tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love

programme.title: 10,000 Miles

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: A veteran investigating the bizarre murder of a fellow officer discovers a mysterious figure in the body cam footage. She suspects something supernatural is targeting the cops in her unit.

programme.title: Red Riding Hood (2011)
programme.desc: A young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

programme.title: Love Under the Olive Tree
programme.desc: When feisty Nicole and competitive Jake face-off in the annual olive oil contest, they never expect sparks to fly.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: A pair of newlyweds finds their blissful peace shattered by the groom's best friend who overstays his welcome.

programme.title: The Mask
programme.desc: Eye-popping fun as Jim Carrey transforms from a mild-mannered bank employee to a wild, vengeful, party boy with the help of a mysterious mask.

programme.title: Syriana
programme.desc: George Clooney is a ready-to-retire CIA veteran who gets sucked into a dangerous conspiracy on his last mission in the Middle East.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A girl asked to be maid of honor at her best friend's wedding must face off with an alpha bridesmaid who wants to take over her job and best friend status.
